description: n! / number of divisors of n.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,100
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,23,print(n!/numdiv(n)))(PARI) { f=1; for (n=1, 100, f*=n; write("b062358.txt", n, " ", f/numdiv(n)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 06 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 06 2001
